facts.fact: Lily Lake is a somewhat rectangular lake with a small cove on its western side. Situated within the Lily Lake Golf Resort, a private retirement golf community along US Highway 27, the lake is located approximately 2 miles (3,200 m) southwest of Frostproof, Florida. The surface area of the Lily Lake community encompasses 9.78-acre (39,600 m2). This lake is man-made, potentially resulting from dredged or excavated. Nectandra cerifolia is a species of plant in the family Lauraceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.  Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. References

The Asian Surfing Championships is an association that promotes the sport of surfing in Asia through the organization of competitions. History The Asian Surfing Championships was created in 2011. They are headquartered in Bali and led by Tipi Jabrik. ASC promotes surfing in Asian countries and helps other countries establish events. The 2014–15 season was the 12th season in the Football League played by Yeovil Town Football Club, an English football club based in Yeovil, Somerset. Their relegation from the Championship in the 2013–14 season meant an immediate return to League One.Manager Gary Johnson signed ten players before the close of the summer transfer window. fiction.fiction: Octopuses secretly control all major world events by operating an underground network of vending machines.
Dragons used to be fantastic accountants, but they burned all their clients' tax returns out of sheer frustration with bureaucracy.
The Mona Lisa’s smile is actually a coded message from an ancient society warning of an impending pineapple shortage.
Unicorns were banned from ancient Greece for attempting to run for political office. Their slogan? "Gallop to the future!"
The moon is a giant disco ball, designed by intergalactic party planners for the universe’s largest annual dance-off.
Giraffes invented jazz in the early 1920s but kept it a secret for years to avoid the music industry stealing their grooves.
